description: This table contains general information about questionnaire answer records. For example, the questionnaire the answer record is for, the date it was answered, and whether the answer record is closed.

columns.name: ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the questionnaire answer record.

columns.name: REC_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created this record.

columns.name: PE_HX_REVIEWED_YN
columns.description:
This records whether a provider has viewed the history data in this record in the MyChart\Welcome patient history visit navigator section. It is assumed that if the provider has had a chance to look at the submitted history data, they have filed or reviewed the data. After the provider review, MyChart and Welcome will start pre-loading answers from the history section rather than the patient's previous responses.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PE_HX_DONE_YN
columns.description:
This records whether a provider has completed review of the history data in this record in the MyChart\Welcome patient history visit navigator section. After the provider review, MyChart and Welcome will start pre-loading answers from the history section rather than the patient's previous responses.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PE_HX_REVIEWED_YN

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the research study-patient association for the questionnaire.

columns.name: IMG_PROC_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Virtual item that returns the record ID for the ORD that points to the given Questionnaire Answer
